org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract

Class AbstractFSContractTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract.AbstractFSContractTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContractOptions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContractAppendTest, AbstractContractConcatTest, AbstractContractCreateTest, AbstractContractDeleteTest, AbstractContractMkdirTest, AbstractContractOpenTest, AbstractContractRenameTest, AbstractContractRootDirectoryTest, AbstractContractSeekTest, TestLocalFSContractLoaded

    public abstract class AbstractFSContractTestBase
extends org.junit.Assert
implements ContractOptions
    This is the base class for all the contract tests

      • handleRelaxedException

        protected void handleRelaxedException(String action,
                          String expectedException,
                          Exception e)
                               throws Exception
        Handle the outcome of an operation not being the strictest exception desired, but one that, while still within the boundary of the contract, is a bit looser. If the FS contract says that they support the strictest exceptions, that is what they must return, and the exception here is rethrown
        Parameters:
        action - Action
        expectedException - what was expected
        e - exception that was received
        Throws:
        Exception

      • handleExpectedException

        protected void handleExpectedException(Exception e)
        Handle expected exceptions through logging and/or other actions
        Parameters:
        e - exception raised.
